entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell TabBar - OnClicked event or other way to detect click on currently active tab #15301
  • In the maui blazorWebView development, in order to display images provided by external websites, Content-Security-Policy is used, and data: http: https: has been specified, as follows: #15299
  • Windows Titlebar where Close-Max-Min buttons rendered are different from where they are clickable #15297
  • NavigationPage BackButtonPressed sent ignores Android OnBackPressed #15296
  • Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException when I try to start a ForegroundService #15292
  • TextToSpeech rate and current reading index #15290
  • ScrollView inside a dynamic Grid row won't completely scroll (iOS) #15288
  • .Net 8P4 WPF/Maiu can't load Blazor Router #15287

Closed

  • Maui xaml x:static can not get value from base class? #15285
  • Preventing NullReferenceException on WebAuthenticatorIntermediateActivity #13798
    .NET 8 Planning
  • WebAuthenticator crash with some browsers #13302
    Backlog
  • OnPageAppearing firing before the OnNavigatedTo event for a page #15256
  • Can't use certificate by trusted source while publishing maui blazor app #7961
  • Exception Throw when Trimming Mode is Enable #8631

PullRequests

Created

  • Formalize virtual layout concepts and fix iOS memory leaks #15303
  • [android] update AOT profile for .NET 8 Preview 5 #15302
  • [net7.0] Set DOTNET_gcServer #15300

Merged

  • Enable parallel builds back #15298
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Set DOTNET_gcServer #15275
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix Android WebAuth callback for system browser flows #15187
    area/essentials 🍞

Updated

  • Update cake scripts #15277
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Ensure "text boxes" preserve cursor location #15099
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.AppCompat.AppCompatResources from 1.6.1.1 to 1.6.1.2 #15263
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.9.0 to 1.9.0.1 #15270
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.RecyclerView from 1.3.0.1 to 1.3.0.2 #15272
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net7.0] Set Version for Windows #15240
  • Improved WebUtils.ParseQueryString() #15245
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Common from 2.5.3.2 to 2.5.3.3 #15260
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix issue with CollectionView ignoring margins for content #15246
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Use [AppendTo|PrependTo|Replace]Mapping for Focus commands #15040
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • [net8.] Merge main #15186
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #15235
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
